Detailed Description

Module for querying and measuring time.

Function Documentation

chaos::uint64 chaos::clock::get_current_time ( TimeMetric  metric = METRIC_MILLISECONDS)

Returns the time elapsed since Linux Epoch (1st January 1970).

Parameters
metricMetric the returned value will be measured in. Defaults to METRIC_MILLISECONDS
